title: Register
email-conflict: There is already an account associated with the email entered.
email-invalid: The email entered is not valid.
username-min-length: The username must be at least 3 characters long.
password-conflict: The password and confirm password fields must be the same.

confirm-password-required: You need to confirm the password.
with-account-button: Already have an account? Log in
register-unknown-error: Unable to register, please try again.
